text: Agar [dar Uhud] ʙa sumo gazande rasid, ʙa dusmanoni sumo niz [dar cangi Badr ʙa hamon sakl] oseʙ rasid [pas, muqovimat kuned]. Mo in ruzho [-i sikastu piruzi]-ro mijoni mardum megardonem, to Alloh taolo, mu'minon [-i voqei]-ro ma'lum dorad va az sumo mu'minon [onero, ki soʙitqadam ast] ʙar digaron guvoh girad; va Alloh taolo sitamgoronro dust namedorad
